name: Holzmaler

review text: The cocktails were very nice, and we spent 2.5 hours here with zero problem. However, when we went to ask the bartender what drink he was making while sitting at the bar, he literally freaked out and gave us a lecture about bothering him. …

Decent but not snobbish atmosphere.
Fair pricing for superb drinks. Crowd is a mixture of students, boheme and established people. Ring the bell!

One of the.. sorry the best bar experience in the city. A hidden gem, authentic as it can be in the most authentic neighborhood.
Great spot for an intimate date, a classy boys night out or simply a place to go …

The place is nice and cozy, but the bar staff was extremely unfriendly, and also rude. No one in the group wanted to go and order the next rounds because the bartender (the bald gentleman with glasses) was almost scary to interact with, so …

For me personally one of the best bars in Stuttgart. Great service with bartenders who take their time to serve you an individualized cocktail - and this always with a smile:-) Great!
